claims.claim: Supervision fees pose a financial burden on those under supervision.
claims.quote: I had supervision fees. I forgot how much it was. It was a while ago. But yeah, I had supervision fees.

claims.claim: Meeting supervision fee requirements is a condition for ending probation or parole.
claims.quote: you can't get off of parole until your supervision fees are paid off.

claims.claim: Job applications have moved online, posing challenges for those unfamiliar with technology.
claims.quote: you go in and ask, can I get a application? They have your paper application. So that changed. Doing it online, no more in-person, stuff like that.

claims.claim: The shift to online services for basic needs like Medicaid and food stamps excludes those not adept with technology.
claims.quote: go online to fill out for your Medicaid, Medicare, your, food stamps, everything went to online and talking to the computer people on the phone, and I was used to going in person and talking to people.

claims.claim: Dependencies on technology for societal functions alienate those not comfortable with or skilled in its use.
claims.quote: I don't like the way society has phased into dependent on technology.

claims.claim: Access to basic toiletries is a pressing need for women returning home from prison.
claims.quote: I was embarrassed to ask somebody buy me some pads and a toothbrush and some soap and some deodorant when I first came out. 'cause I ain't have, I didn't have any money when I first came out.

claims.claim: Creating housing opportunities for returning women from prison is essential to ease their reentry.
claims.quote: So now I help women returning home from prison and hopefully in three months I have my own house. So they will have a place to parole too.

claims.claim: Community support is vital for the successful reentry of formerly incarcerated women.
claims.quote: I have a CARES program right now where I meet the ladies when they get outta prison and it's a welcome home bag with soap, deodorant, toothpaste, toothbrush, washcloth, towel mouthwash, all the basic needs.
